channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta reportedly scores two more high-profile OpenAI researchers
item.description: OpenAI researcher Jason Wei will reportedly join Meta’s new Superintelligence Lab. Another team member, Hyung Won Chung, might also join Meta, as the ...

item.title: UK retail giant Co-op confirms hackers stole all 6.5 million customer records
item.description: The hackers stole the company's member list, which included customer names, addresses, and contact information.

item.title: Rex Salisbury’s Cambrian Ventures raises new fund, bucking fintech slowdown
item.description: Spurred by the performance of its first fund, Cambrian Ventures' $20 million second fund will continue the firm's thesis of focusing on fintech startu...

item.title: Bang & Olufsen Beosound A1 (Gen 3) Review: Perpetually Great
item.description: Third time’s a charm for this elegantly designed and sonically refined Bluetooth speaker.

item.title: Best Camping Chairs (2025): Snow Peak, Kelty, Helinox, and More
item.description: Whether you’re hiking, tailgating, or relaxing in the garden, take the weight off in style with these WIRED-tested chairs for the great outdoors.

item.title: Our 11 Favorite Air Quality Monitors We’ve Tried (2025)
item.description: These WIRED-tested indoor and outdoor air-quality monitors have been teaching us things about our air quality we can never unsee.

item.title: Meet the cement transport ship that makes cement ingredients while sailing
item.description: London-based Seabound has developed a carbon capture system that transforms CO2 from a ship's engine into limestone, which Heidelberg Materials will u...

item.title: Former Top Google Researchers Have Made a New Kind of AI Agent
item.description: The mission? Teaching models to better understand how to build code will lead to superintelligent AI.

item.title: Chinese authorities are using a new tool to hack seized phones and extract data
item.description: Researchers warned that Chinese residents, and visitors to China, should be aware of the tool's existence and the risks it poses.

item.title: Razer Freyja Review: A Haptic Gaming Cushion for Better Immersion
item.description: Razer’s haptic gaming cushion can make your favorite virtual worlds feel real, if you don’t mind the uncomfy seat.
